name: Dream Gen
description:
Dream Gen is a polyrhythm generator. It allows you to build infinite combinations of sounds and rhythms.



Dream Gen creates stunning visualisations of the polyrhythms you design.



Dream Gen allows you to control the number of notes and chords, with control over each notes pitch, and rhythm pattern. You can modulate the global time, and global pitch.



You can import any wav file as a sample, and then there is inbuilt reverb and low pass filtering controls.



On the visual end, you can control bloom, particles, the motion of the notes, as well as the shape. You can set them to any colour you like as well.



You can even export your polyrhythms to MIDI, allowing them to be used in your DAW of choice.
